CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 16, 1954, pg. 16, reads: "Aida Makes Curtain - 'Aida' presented by the National Negro Opera Foundation, Inc., and its Pittsburgh Opera Guild, at Syria Mosque Saturday night overcame difficulties and answered critics of the effort by giving a commendable performance...youthful dancing group, left to right, the Misses Catherine Tab, Yvonne Jones, Carol McClain, Marlene Jones, Yvonne Kerscham, Mayme [Mamie] Hamilton, Sarah Burnet, Doris Burley, Erma Burney, Lois Jean Dougan and Sylvia Davis...Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Dancers, from left: Catherine Tab, Yvonne Jones (Kemp), Carol McClain, Marlene Jones, Yvonne Kerscham, Mamie Hamilton, Sarah Burney, Doris Burley, Erma Burney, Lois Jean Dougan, and Sylvia Davis, wearing costumes for National Negro Opera Company performance of "Aida"
